text: ¿Jas kꞌu che kꞌax kanaꞌ che ri awachalal are kꞌo jun nitzꞌ mes pa ubꞌoqꞌoch are kꞌu ri at kꞌo jun kutaꞌm pa ri awe?6:41 Ri winaq aꞌj Israel kakijunamaj jun nitzꞌ uxeꞌr cheꞌ rachiꞌl jun rachaq cheꞌ rukꞌ ri mak. We kꞌin laj nitzꞌ ri mak kajunumataj rukꞌ jun laj uxeꞌr cheꞌ are kꞌu we nim kajunumataj rukꞌ jun rachaq cheꞌ.
